thread.title: Britney Spears' niece wakes from coma following near-fatal accident
thread.title_full: Britney Spears' niece wakes from coma following near-fatal accident

title: Britney Spears' niece wakes from coma following near-fatal accident
text:
Britney Spears' niece wakes from coma following near-fatal accident Britney Spears' niece wakes from coma following near-fatal accident BRITNEY Spears' niece has now "regained consciousness" following a near-fatal accident that left her fighting for her life. / Published 8th February 2017 
Maddie Aldridge was left in "critical" condition after she was seriously injured while riding an ATV on Sunday. 
The eight-year-old lost control of the vehicle during the hunting trip near the family’s home in Louisiana and sped into a pond after she tried to avoid driving over a draining ditch. 
The only daughter of Britney's younger sister Jamie Lynn, then became submerged under water with her mum and stepdad, who is also called Jamie, desperately trying to free the youngster from the vehicle. 
INSTAGRAM CONSCIOUS: Maddie was left in critical condition after an ATV accident on Sunday “With her father, mother and stepfather by her side, Maddie regained consciousness mid-day Tuesday, February 7” Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff’s Department 
Once emergency services arrived on the scene, Maddie was airlifted to a nearby hospital. 
"With her father, mother and stepfather by her side, Maddie regained consciousness mid-day Tuesday, February 7," a statement from the Tangipahoa Parish Sheriff’s Department read. 
INSTAGRAM PRAYERS: Britney urged her fans to pray for the youngster Britney Spears sexiest pictures Britney Spears strips down to her bikini for some seriously hot snaps. 1 / 56 
INSTAGRAM SAFETY: Jamie Lynn and her husband rushed to save Maddie from the water 
"The eight-year-old daughter of entertainer Jamie Lynn Spears was involved in an ATV accident at a family home Sunday in Kentwood, La. Paramedics resuscitated her and she was airlifted to a local hospital. 
"She is aware of her surroundings and recognises those family members who have kept a round-the-clock vigil since the accident." 
Maddie is still being monitored closely but doctors have removed a ventilator that was helping to keep alive. Celebrity child star meltdowns Wednesday, 17th February 2016 There's a history of child stars going 'off the rails' and here's a selection of them. 1 / 11 Getty Britney Spears - Went through a huge public meltdown in 2007 where she shaved her head and lashed out at the public 
INSTAGRAM MIRACLE: Maddie is said to be doing wonderfully 
The statement continued: "It appears that she has not suffered any neurological consequences from the accident." 
A friend of the Spears family also spoke to Gossip Cop about the "miracle" of Maddie's speedy recovery and that she's doing "wonderfully". 
They said: "It’s truly been amazing. She has responded miraculously every step of the way." Related articles
